title: Samhi Hotels garners Rs 617 crore from anchor investors
description: Samhi Hotels has raised Rs 616.54 crore from anchor investors before its initial share sale. The company has allocated equity shares to 35 entities at an average price of Rs 126 apiece. Anchor investors include SBI Mutual Fund, Aditya Birla Sun Life MF, ICICI Prudential MF, and Tata MF. The IPO comprises fresh issuance of equity shares worth up to Rs 1,200 crore and an Offer For Sale of up to 1.35 crore shares. Samhi Hotels acquires/builds primary hotels and currently owns 4,800 keys across 31 operating hotels.
